name: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Fry pancetta with garlic until crispy.
Whisk eggs and parmesan cheese in a bowl.
Combine cooked spaghetti with pancetta and egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 1 hour.
Grill or bake chicken until cooked through.
Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger in a pan.
Add tomato puree and garam masala, then simmer.
Add grilled chicken and cream, then simmer for 10 minutes.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Cream butter and sugars together.
Add eggs and vanilla, then mix.
Combine dry ingredients and mix into the wet ingredients.
Fold in chocolate chips and drop spoonfuls onto a baking sheet.
Bake for 10-12 minutes.

name: Beef Stir Fry
steps: Slice beef thinly and marinate in soy sauce.
Stir-fry beef in sesame oil until browned, then set aside.
Stir-fry vegetables with garlic and ginger.
Add beef back to the pan and toss to combine.
Serve with rice or noodles.

name: Margherita Pizza
steps: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out pizza dough and spread tomato sauce.
Top with sliced mozzarella and fresh basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and bake for 10-12 minutes.

name: Caesar Salad
steps: Grill or bake chicken breast until cooked.
Chop romaine lettuce and place in a bowl.
Add croutons, parmesan cheese, and sliced chicken.
Toss with caesar dressing and serve.

name: Pancakes
steps: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Whisk wet ingredients in another bowl.
Combine wet and dry ingredients to form a batter.
Heat a skillet and pour batter to form pancakes.
Flip when bubbles form on the surface, then cook the other side.

name: Guacamole
steps: Mash avocados in a bowl.
Add lime juice, diced onion, tomato, cilantro, and jalapeño.
Season with salt and mix well.
Serve with tortilla chips.

name: Beef Burger
steps: Form ground beef into patties and season with salt and pepper.
Grill or fry patties until cooked to desired doneness.
Toast burger buns and assemble with lettuce, tomato, onion, cheese, and pickles.
Add ketchup and serve.

name: Vegetable Soup
steps: Sauté onions, carrots, and celery in a pot.
Add garlic and thyme, then cook for 1 minute.
Add diced potatoes, tomatoes, and vegetable broth.
Simmer for 20-30 minutes until vegetables are tender.

name: Fried Rice
steps: Heat sesame oil in a pan and scramble eggs.
Add diced carrots and peas, then stir-fry.
Add cooked rice and soy sauce, then toss to combine.
Garnish with green onions and serve.

name: Lasagna
steps: Cook lasagna noodles according to package instructions.
Brown ground beef and mix with tomato sauce.
Layer noodles, beef sauce, ricotta, and mozzarella in a baking dish.
Top with parmesan cheese and bake at 375°F (190°C) for 30 minutes.

name: Omelette
steps: Whisk eggs and milk in a bowl.
Pour into a heated skillet and let it set slightly.
Add diced ham, bell peppers, and onions.
Fold the omelette and cook until eggs are fully set.

name: Banana Bread
steps: Mash bananas in a bowl.
Mix in melted butter, sugar, eggs, and vanilla.
Add flour and baking soda, then mix until combined.
Pour into a loaf pan and bake at 350°F (175°C) for 50-60 minutes.

name: Sushi Rolls
steps: Cook sushi rice and mix with rice vinegar.
Spread rice on a sheet of nori.
Add sliced cucumber, avocado, and crab sticks.
Roll tightly and slice into pieces.
Serve with soy sauce.

name: Shepherd's Pie
steps: Cook ground lamb with onions and carrots.
Add peas and beef broth, then simmer.
Mash boiled potatoes with butter.
Layer meat mixture in a baking dish and top with mashed potatoes.
Bake at 400°F (200°C) for 20 minutes.

name: French Toast
steps: Whisk eggs, milk, cinnamon, and vanilla in a bowl.
Dip bread slices into the mixture.
Fry in butter until golden brown on both sides.
Serve with syrup or powdered sugar.

name: Chicken Noodle Soup
steps: Cook chicken breast in chicken broth until tender.
Shred chicken and return to the pot.
Add diced carrots, celery, and onions.
Add noodles and cook until tender.

name: Tacos
steps: Brown ground beef and add taco seasoning.
Fill taco shells with beef.
Top with lettuce, tomato, cheese, and sour cream.
Serve immediately.

name: Apple Pie
steps: Peel and slice apples, then toss with sugar, cinnamon, and flour.
Line a pie dish with pie crust and add the apple mixture.
Dot with butter and cover with the top crust.
Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 45-50 minutes.
